title: iduvE sukhanilai
sahitya:
iduvE sukhanilai suyanilai manamE iranDarak-kalanda nilai enrum


anupallavi

  adutAn Aghiya idaya brahma nilai Ananda nilai iduvE manamE


caraNam    enrum calanaminri irundapaDi irukkum EkAnta bhOga nilai
venru bhEda buddhiyai vEraTra onrAgum vEdAnta nilai aduvE
konr-ahankArattaik-koDuttukkoNDu tannai kulavum turiya nilaiyE
onrum bhAva samAdhi Om tat sat ennum nilai uNmai amara nilaiyE manamE
